messages.subject: Thank You
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you all for the suggestions I received regarding my son s sleepover!  Just thought I would let you all know that the rain and snow did hold off and we
messages.messageBody:
Thank you all for the suggestions I received regarding
my son's sleepover! Just thought I would let you all
know that the rain and snow did hold off and we were
able to get the bonfire lit. All went very well. We
ate roasted hot-dogs till we could have popped. We
did roast the marshmallows inside on candles though,
(that was a terrific idea). We played many games and
all was a success. We did have to answer a lot of
questions from all of our ps friends. They were all
very interested in what we are doing!! My boys were
very proud to have the opportunity to show off their
work and projects.


=====
Kim - Missouri MOM of Dylan(10) Jacob(10) Noah(20 mos)
